title: Unexpected Dreams
description: Divorce is a big change… But there are bigger ones… 	A few months after his divorce and many failed blind dates, Greg Fairchild met Tanner Williams. What started out as a good friendship unexpectedly turned into something that Greg didn't know what to do with…attraction. Why would he be attracted to a man? He had been a ladies man back in the day. He was married for more than 20 years—to a woman… He fathered three children with that woman…. He was a Republican! 	Was this unexpected development a mid-life crisis? Or had he been living a lie all these years?WARNING: This book contains subject material of an adult nature intended for readers over the age of 18.
author: Isabelle Peterson
